metalanguage and syntax specificationtwo metalanguages are described one sufficientfor the table specification of the algol syntax the other with additional metaoperators adequate and usedfor the formal table description of basic fortran.cacm may 1965burkhardt w h.ca650508 jb march 7 1978 2:19 pm1046 4 12631086 4 12631105 4 12631132 4 12631139 4 12631140 4 12631234 4 12631234 4 12631263 4 12631263 4 12631263 4 12631265 4 12631265 4 12631270 4 12631323 4 12631358 4 12631379 4 12631380 4 12631453 4 12631453 4 12631464 4 12631484 4 12631491 4 12631496 4 12631498 4 12631613 4 12631614 4 12631781 4 12631781 4 12631824 4 12631825 4 12631860 4 12631945 4 12632083 4 12632126 4 12632178 4 12632179 4 12632252 4 12632325 4 12632341 4 12632546 4 12632546 4 1263464 4 12632645 4 12632652 4 12632684 4 12632842 4 12632929 4 12632934 4 1263584 4 12633069 4 1263631 4 1263653 4 1263669 4 1263679 4 1263680 4 1263691 4 1263761 4 1263763 4 1263795 4 1263799 4 1263945 4 1263949 4 1263989 4 1263989 5 12631263 5 12631263 5 12631263 5 12631379 5 1263404 5 12633184 5 12631263 6 12631477 6 12633184 6 1263669 6 1263761 6 1263
